Reviews.Content: Small But Perfect As soon as I walked into the hotel I loved it. The hotel is small but has a lovely atmosphere. I had a single room  found it very clean  comfortable. The size of the room  bathroom were good. I liked having an opening window and air conditioning to choose from to combat the early September heat! The hotel felt very secure because access from outside was controlled by the hotel staff. The owners were friendly  very helpful. The continental breakfast was plentiful. The hotel is well positioned for walking around central Florence, I would definitely stay there again  hope I can do so soon!
Reviews.Author: ellwa

Reviews.Content: Nice little hotel A small family-run hotel in a perfect location, less than 10 minuites walk from the train  bus station, and about the same distant to the city center. Rooms are not very large but nice and clean. If you are a light sleeper, please request for the inner rooms. The room that we'd got was the first room which was adjacent to the lobby. What we enjoyed most was the breakfast prepared by those lovely hotel staffs, and owners. They really tried to make your stay comfortable and memorable. Thank you to all of them. We saw many parking spots in front of the hotel, and noticed that the restaurant downstair was pretty busy  fun. We had a great time at Relais Il Cestello. It is not a fancy hotel, but it is surely warm and lovely :-)Suvit L., Bangkok, Thailand
Reviews.Author: Suvit
